title: PlayStation's PC Push Continues - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.25.22
description:
PlayStation is hiring for a senior director of PC planning and strategy at PlayStation Global, Ravensoftware QA testers get a union election, and NPD reminds us that Elden Ring and Gran Turismo 7 are dominating the charts.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:46 - Housekeeping

KFW April Anarchy pops off today. This is the Kinda Funny Wrestling payperview that’s totally free on Twitch right after KFGD. See Alanah defend her title against Joey and Elyse, Johnny Ace take on the Milk Mommy for the Kinda Funny Championship, and so much more. If you miss it live, it’ll be on youtube.com/kindafunnygames tomorrow.

The Roper Report  -

00:05:30 - Sony is hiring a 'senior director for PC planning and strategy'
00:18:39 - 21 Raven Software QA employees will be allowed to have a union election
00:24:45 - Activision Financial Results
00:30:52 - Ads
00:34:03 - Let’s get into the NPD with Mat Piscatella over on Twitter
00:40:50 - The Top 20 of 2022
00:53:33 - Out today
00:56:28 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Whitta
